meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michael Roy Bonnie Harris Jessica Johnston Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7486.

td.p: Michael Roy, a controls engineer from New Orleans, Louisiana
Bonnie Harris, an English instructor and administrator from New York, New York
Jessica Johnston, a college admission officer from Pasadena, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $20,400)

tr.td: HOT PLACES
BOOKS FOR COOKS
THE MARCH OF HISTORY
REALITY TELEVISION
FULL OF QUESTIONS
5 "W"s
